Name: EvidenceVariable
Description: A population, intervention, or exposure definition+ Warning: Name should be usable as an identifier for the module by machine processing applications such as code generationElements defined in Ancestors: id, meta, implicitRules, language, text, contained, extension, modifierExtension

Name: url
Description: Canonical identifier for this evidence variable, represented as a URI (globally unique)

Name: identifier
Description: Additional identifier for the evidence variable

Name: version
Description: Business version of the evidence variable

Name: name
Description: Name for this evidence variable (computer friendly)

Name: title
Description: Name for this evidence variable (human friendly)

Name: shortTitle
Description: Title for use in informal contexts

Name: subtitle
Description: Subordinate title of the EvidenceVariable

Name: status
Description: draft | active | retired | unknownPublicationStatus (Required)

Name: date
Description: Date last changed

Name: publisher
Description: Name of the publisher (organization or individual)

Name: contact
Description: Contact details for the publisher

Name: description
Description: Natural language description of the evidence variable

Name: note
Description: Used for footnotes or explanatory notes

Name: useContext
Description: The context that the content is intended to support

Name: jurisdiction
Description: Intended jurisdiction for evidence variable (if applicable)Jurisdiction (Extensible)

Name: copyright
Description: Use and/or publishing restrictions

Name: approvalDate
Description: When the evidence variable was approved by publisher

Name: lastReviewDate
Description: When the evidence variable was last reviewed

Name: effectivePeriod
Description: When the evidence variable is expected to be used

Name: topic
Description: The category of the EvidenceVariable, such as Education, Treatment, Assessment, etc.DefinitionTopic (Example)

Name: author
Description: Who authored the content

Name: editor
Description: Who edited the content

Name: reviewer
Description: Who reviewed the content

Name: endorser
Description: Who endorsed the content

Name: relatedArtifact
Description: Additional documentation, citations, etc.

Name: type
Description: dichotomous | continuous | descriptiveEvidenceVariableType (Required)

Name: characteristic
Description: What defines the members of the evidence element

Name: description
Description: Natural language description of the characteristic

Name: definitionReference(group)
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: definitionCanonical(activitydefinition)
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: definitionCodeableconcept
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: definitionExpression
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: definitionDatarequirement
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: definitionTriggerdefinition
Description: What code or expression defines members?

Name: usageContext
Description: What code/value pairs define members?

Name: exclude
Description: Whether the characteristic includes or excludes members

Name: participantEffectiveDatetime
Description: What time period do participants cover

Name: participantEffectivePeriod
Description: What time period do participants cover

Name: participantEffectiveDuration
Description: What time period do participants cover

Name: participantEffectiveTiming
Description: What time period do participants cover

Name: timeFromStart
Description: Observation time from study start

Name: groupMeasure
Description: mean | median | mean-of-mean | mean-of-median | median-of-mean | median-of-medianGroupMeasure (Required)
